Class GeometricMinimizer

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield.GeometricMinimizer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ForceField
public class GeometricMinimizer
extends java.lang.Object

Call the minimization methods. Check the convergence.

vlabarta

function - energy function value.
